title: How to reproduce a torch RNN net in pytorch
body_html:
I need to Reproduce the torch net in pytorch, especially the RNN layer part.
and this is my pytorch net
when I run it, it produce an error message
RuntimeError: matrices expected, got 1D, 2D tensors at /b/wheel/pytorch-src/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c:1232
and the error code is
x7 = self.rnn(x6)
anyone helps me? Thanks!

body:
I need to Reproduce the [torch net](https://github.com/Andybert/torch-and-pytorch/blob/master/torch%20net) in pytorch, especially the RNN layer part. 
and this is my [pytorch net](https://github.com/Andybert/torch-and-pytorch/blob/master/pytorch%20net)
when I run it, it produce an error message 
RuntimeError: matrices expected, got 1D, 2D tensors at /b/wheel/pytorch-src/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c:1232
and the error code is 
x7 = self.rnn(x6)
anyone helps me? Thanks!
